definition: table/desk/classifier for tables of guests at a banquet etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to crawl under a table (e.g. as a penalty for losing in a card game)

sentences.english: The cat under the table is Tama.
sentences.chinese: 桌子下面的那隻貓叫塔瑪。

sentences.english: Cosette had emerged from under the table.
sentences.chinese: 珂賽特從桌子底下鑽出來。

sentences.english: A shop assistance hung it on a rack or placed it on a table with many others.
sentences.chinese: 店員把它掛到貨架上，或與其它東西一起擺到桌子上。

sentences.english: We spread the map out on the table.
sentences.chinese: 我們把地圖展開鋪在桌子上。

sentences.english: He placed the money on the table.
As it was dark, he stubbed his toe against the table leg.
sentences.chinese: 由於天暗看不見，他的腳趾碰到了桌子腳。

sentences.english: He glued it to the desk.
sentences.chinese: 他把它用膠粘到桌子上。

sentences.english: Furniture such as tables, chairs and cupboards is also made from wood.
sentences.chinese: 如桌子，椅子，廚櫃這類傢俱也是由木做成的。

sentences.english: When I reached his table, I stood behind the chair across from him, unsure.
sentences.chinese: 我走到他的桌子旁，不太確定地站在他對面的椅子後。

sentences.english: He jumped onto the table, turned over the cage tried to catch me.
sentences.chinese: 它跳上桌子，把籠子掀倒，企圖抓住我。

sentences.english: The red chairs, the lamps and the table are from the street.
sentences.chinese: 紅椅子，燈和桌子是從街上撿來的。

sentences.english: If the table is too low, hold the saucer at waist height.
sentences.chinese: 如果桌子太矮了，把茶碟端在齊腰的高度。

sentences.english: He starts talking to people at the table, away from me.
sentences.chinese: 他開始和桌子跟前的人們說話，離開了我。

sentences.english: Bo-Bo:Whose rubber is it on the table?
Spread some flour on the table and roll the pastry out very thin .
sentences.chinese: 在桌子上撒些麪粉把餡餅皮擀得很薄。

sentences.english: And slowly the kind man comes closer loses his rage sits down at table.
sentences.chinese: 那個和藹的男人走近了，熄滅怒火在桌子旁坐下來。

definition: small side table/coffee table/teapoy (ornamental tripod with caddies for tea)
table/desk/classifier for tables of guests at a banquet etc
sofa (loanword)/CL:條|条[tiao2],張|张[zhang1]/(Internet slang) the first reply or replier to a forum post
old-fashioned square table to seat eight people
